title: Lawrence O'Donnell: Invoking 25th Amendment Against Trump, Declaration Of Presidential Inability
text:
Lawrence O'Donnell: Invoking 25th Amendment Against Trump, Declaration Of Presidential Inability | Posted By Ian Schwartz On Date February 21, 2017 
MSNBC: There's a way to remove Donald Trump from office without impeachment. It comes from another section of the Constitution â and the man who controls most of that power is Trump's Vice President: Mike Pence.
